Comment: I wasn't retired when I was going to civil rights and Vietnam War protests in the 60s and 70s.   I was working and being a student full time.     Also six of the seven Trump protests that I've been to were on weekends.    Most people have some free time - it's just a question of how you prioritize it compared to the other things you think are important.     In recent years we've had plenty of other protest movements such as Extinction Rebellion and the George Floyd protests where there were plenty of young people.   So I've been assuming that the reason why we don't have many young people at this is because young people must think Donald Trump is just fine.
